fields.summary: BlackBerry: KitchenSink: Phone > Photo Gallery: the photo cannot be selected from the phone's photo gallery

fields.description:
h5.Description:
1. Launch KS.
2. Go to Phone -->Photo Gallery

h5.Actual Result:
1. The device photo gallery does not open & we just see a grey view.

h5.Expected Result:
1. The devices photo gallery should open & we should be able to select photos from the gallery.
fields.summary: BlackBerry: KitchenSink: Phone > Photo Gallery; the phone's photo gallery does not open

Photo Galery opens, but the image cannot be selected.
